title: Simulation-Based Intensive Training for Strengthening Disaster Management Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of disaster types (earthquakes, floods, etc.) and safety protocols
context.additional_context: Learners are students/job seekers enrolled in social sector curricula at vocational training institutions, aiming for intermediate-level expertise in disaster management. They cultivate practical response capabilities through VR simulations and group collaboration in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Accurately identify 80% or more risk factors in VR simulations based on real disaster scenarios
Teams establish disaster response plans that meet two or more of the three evaluation criteria (clarity, feasibility)
Oral presentation of three-stage evacuation procedures for each disaster type (earthquake/flood/fire) within 15 minutes
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
